nodes.title: Acid Dragon attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create the evil and vile acid dragon Mortano to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero vanquishes the Acid Dragon, a powerful strike sends the dragon to it's doom. Your victory gives the hero insight into the meaning of reality.

nodes.title: A single bandit attacks Hero
nodes.description: You cause a single bandit to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to defeat the single bandit through violent methods. The corpse marres the victory.

nodes.title: Hero attacks a bandit base
nodes.description: You gather bandits into a base and cause the Hero to become aware of the base.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to defeat the entire base of bandits. the victory is marred by the violence.

nodes.title: A gang of bandits attacks Hero
nodes.description: You cause a bloodthirsty gang of armed bandits to target and attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to defeat a group of bandits by violent means. The victory is marred by violence.

nodes.title: A group of bandits attacks Hero
nodes.description: You cause a group of cutthroat bandits to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to defeat a group of bandits through violent means. Their corpses mar the victory.

nodes.title: A corrupted hydra attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create a Corrupted Hydra and have it attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to slay the corrupted Hydra through violent means.

nodes.title: A drake attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create a mighty drake with a gaping maw of death and destruction to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to slay the mighty drake and free the land from a danger.

nodes.title: Hero fights in arena
nodes.description: You incite a arena to be created and an invite to be sent to the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero defeats their opponent in the arena and wins funds.

nodes.title: A fire Dragon attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create the ferocious and mighty fire dragon Azarel to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero vanquishes the Fire Dragon, A swift strike sends the dragon to it's doom. The victory gives the Hero insight into the world.

nodes.title: Ghouls Attack Hero
nodes.description: You create a large group of armored hungering ghouls to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero slays the vile Ghouls in combat.

nodes.title: A goblin army attacks Hero
nodes.description: You cause an army of armored and motivated Goblins to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero slays an entire army of goblins in their vile armor.

nodes.title: A group of goblins attacks Hero
nodes.description: You cause a group of armored Goblins to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero slays a group of armored goblins through swift and decisive actions.

nodes.title: A pack of goblins attacks Hero
nodes.description: You cause a pack of motivated Goblins to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero slays a pack of motivated goblins with ferocity.

nodes.title: A pair of goblins attacks Hero
nodes.description: You cause a pair of Goblins to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero slays a pair of goblins.

nodes.title: Hero meets a martial mentor
nodes.description: You cause a martial mentor to take an interest in the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero meets an incredible fighter, Marcus, who vows to train them.

nodes.title: Ice Dragon attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create the cunning and righteous ice dragon Graftin to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero crushes the cunning Ice Dragon Graftin with a brutal strike and gains insight into battle.

nodes.title: An Undead Lich attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create a powerful neigh undefeatable lich,  to challenge the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero snatches victory from the jaws of defeat and against all odds defeats the lich and gains insight into life.

nodes.title: Martial mentor gives Hero legendary sword
nodes.description: You cause the martial mentor to bequeth the legendary sword Dawnbringer.

effects.resultText: The Legendary fighter Marcus bequeths the unique and indestructible sword Dawnbringer to the Hero.

nodes.title: Hero is taught martial techniques
nodes.description: You cause the martial mentor to teach the Hero martial techniques.

effects.resultText: The Legndary fighter Marcus teaches the Hero effecient fighting techniques.

nodes.title: Skeletons attack Hero
nodes.description: You create a moderate force of skeletons to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero defeats the skeleton warriors and is motivated to become stronger.

nodes.title: Hero trains with weapons
nodes.description: You create a training ground for the Hero to practice their martial arts

effects.resultText: The Hero practices their martial arts and develops their insight in the calm of the practice.

nodes.title: Undead Knight attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create an undead knight zapheral, to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero barely manages to defeat the undead Knight Zapheral and is motivated to improve their skills going forward.

nodes.title: Zombies attack Hero
nodes.description: You create a small force of zombies to attack the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero destroys the Zombies and gains motivation to improve.

nodes.title: Alchemy Mentor gives Hero moderate recipe
nodes.description: You cause the alchemy mentor to teach the Hero an alchemy recipe for glue for all kinds of equipment.

effects.resultText: The Alchemy Master Edlund taught the Hero a complex recipe for glue. The Hero gains insight into mentorship.

nodes.title: Alchemy Mentor teaches Hero mana technique for crafting
nodes.description: You cause the alchemy mentor to teach the Hero a secret mana, the blood method, to imbue all crafting to new heights.

effects.resultText: The Alchemy Master Edlund teaches the Master technique for crafting using blood mana technique.

nodes.title: Cheap crafting material found
nodes.description: You create a small collection of crafting materials for the Hero to come accross.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to practice their crafting with basic recipes.

nodes.title: Come across unused laboratory
nodes.description: You create a labratory filled with crafting materials and complex mechanisms for the Hero to test and use them.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to utilize the crafting Materials in the unused laboratory and gains insight into the universe.

nodes.title: Hero crafts cure for disease
nodes.description: You cause an epidemic giving an opportuninty for the Hero to craft a cure.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to cure the black spot disease. They gain insight into empathy and healing.

nodes.title: Hero crafts explosives
nodes.description: You create a local deposite of nitrogen for the Hero to possibly craft explosives.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to craft explosives. Useful in construction and other uses. Hero gains insight into responsibility.

nodes.title: Hero crafts irregation system
nodes.description: You cause an opportunity for the Hero to craft an irrigation system for a local farm.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to craft an irrigation system for a wide swath of farmland.

nodes.title: Hero crafts shipping carraige
nodes.description: You cause a shipping company to ask the Hero for a new carraige.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to craft the shipping carraige for a local shipping company. The Hero gains insight into responsibility.

nodes.title: Hero finds crafting book
nodes.description: You cause a crafting expert to pass on their lessons in book form to the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to comprehend the crafting recipes. The Hero gains insight into research.

nodes.title: Come across advanced alchemy lab
nodes.description: You create a legendary lab with advanced tools and crafting equipment for the Hero to possibly understand and use.

effects.resultText: The successfully utilizes the legendary alchemy lab with complex crafting tools and chemicals. Hero gains insight into complexity.

nodes.title: Hero crafts armor
nodes.description: You cause a city blacksmith to need assistance to craft armor, and Hero might receive them in exchange.

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully crafts armor.

nodes.title: Hero crafts magical armor
nodes.description: You cause a legendary blacksmith to need assistance to craft magical armor, and the Hero might receive them in exchange.

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully crafts magical pauldrons.

nodes.title: Hero crafts Magical tools
nodes.description: You cause a legendary blacksmith to need assistance to craft magical tools, and the Hero might receive them in exchange.

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully crafts magical hot plates and measurement cups.

nodes.title: Hero crafts Magical weapons
nodes.description: You cause a legendary blacksmith to need assistance to craft magical weapons, and the Hero might receive them in exchange.

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully crafts magical daggers.

nodes.title: Hero crafts tools
nodes.description: You cause a city blacksmith to need assistance to craft tools, and Hero might receive them in exchange.

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully crafts tools.

nodes.title: Hero crafts weapons
nodes.description: You cause a city blacksmith to need assistance to craft weapons, and Hero might receive them in exchange.

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully crafts weapons.

nodes.title: Hero meets an alchemy mentor
nodes.description: You cause an Alchemy mentor to take an interest in the Hero

effects.resultText: The Hero meets the legendary alchemist Journegan.

nodes.title: Hero makes armor
nodes.description: You cause a local blacksmith to seek assistance crafting armor from the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully crafts armor.

nodes.title: Come across moderate crafting materials
nodes.description: You create a moderate collection of crafting materials and ores for the Hero to come accross.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to craft useful tools and manages to smelt raw ores.

nodes.title: Hero deals with bumper crop
nodes.description: You help plants grow creating an opportunity to grow an excess of crops creating an opportunity for market growth for the Hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to secure the excess crops at a discount and make major profits.

nodes.title: Hero creates major company
nodes.description: You create the right set of circumstances for the Hero to create a major trading company across countries.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to create a Major company and seize market share. Major financial improvement.

nodes.title: Hero handles material shortage
nodes.description: You destroy a specific material in the world, the Hero might be able to corner the market.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to purchase the majority of low supply materials. Creating a monopoly and massive financial advantage.

nodes.title: Hero creates shipping company
nodes.description: You create the right set of circumstances for the Hero to create a moderate shipping company.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to create a local shipping company.

nodes.title: Hero creates small shipping company
nodes.description: You create the right set of circumstances for the Hero to create a small company.

effects.resultText: The Hero manages to create a small niche company.

nodes.title: Hero discovers copper mine
nodes.description: You create a copper mine for the Hero to gain some funding.

effects.resultText: The Hero discovers a copper mine and strips it for materials.

nodes.title: Hero discovers gold mine
nodes.description: You create a gold mine for the Hero to gain significant funding.

effects.resultText: The Hero discovers a Gold mine and thoroughly mines the materials for massive gain.

nodes.title: Hero discovers silver mine
nodes.description: You create a silver mine for the Hero to gain moderate funding.

effects.resultText: The Hero discovers a Silver mine and mines the materials

nodes.title: Hero tries to buy exclusive rights to medicine.
nodes.description: You create a unique medicine in need, the Hero might be able to buy the manufacturing rights and make a hefty profit.

effects.resultText: The Hero purchases the exclusive manufacturing rights to a rare and useful medicine.

nodes.title: Hero tries to buy exclusive rights to toy
nodes.description: You create a unique toy with a lot of interest, the Hero might be able buy the rights and make a profit.

effects.resultText: The Hero purchases the exclusive manufacturing rights to an exclusive rights.

nodes.title: Hero tries to go long on stocks
nodes.description: You manipulate stocks and create an opportunity to make a lot of money.

effects.resultText: The Hero purchases a multitude to low value stocks in the hopes that one will be profitable, The hero was able to buy enough to get lucky.

nodes.title: Hero has investment opportunity with large supplier
nodes.description: You create an investment opportunity for the Hero to invest in a major parts supplier for several major cities.

effects.resultText: The Hero has enough funding to invest in a large corporation.

nodes.title: Hero has investment opportunity with local baker
nodes.description: You create an investment opportunity for the Hero to invest in a local bakers new donuts.

effects.resultText: The Hero has enough funding to invest in a local bakery.

nodes.title: Hero has investment opportunity with Major conglomerate
nodes.description: You create an investment opportunity for the Hero to invest in the Massive multinational company, optum.

effects.resultText: The Hero has the massive amount of funding to invest in a major conglomerate.

nodes.title: Hero has investment opportunity with mercenary guild
nodes.description: You create an investment opportunity for the Hero to invest in a moderate mecenary guild.

effects.resultText: The Hero has the funding to invest in a mercenary guild.

nodes.title: Hero has investment opportunity with small shipping company
nodes.description: You create an investment opportunity for the Hero to invest in a small shipping company.

effects.resultText: The Hero has the funding to invest in a small company.

nodes.title: Hero tries to align internal energies
nodes.description: You cause an influx of mana in the world, the Hero might be able to absorb and align their internal energies.

effects.resultText: The Hero aligns their internal energies with external energies. The magical power increases.
